{{Wireless embedded system |brand=electric imp |model=IMP002 |revision= |asin=B01AX1Y8GC |fcc_date=03/22/2013 |manuf_country=China |manuf=Lite-On |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |type=module |fcc_id=PPQ-IMP002 |ic_id=4491A-IMP002 |cpu1_brand=STMicroelectronics |cpu1_model=STM32F205;STM32, F205RG6, BNML7VG, SGR207Y; |cpu1_cspeed=120 |fla1=1 |fla1_brand=STMicroelectronics |fla1_model=STM32F205 |ram1=128 KiB |ram1_brand=STMicroelectronics |ram1_model=STM32F205 |expansion_if_types=SD (solder down) |expansion_sdcard_num= |serial=yes,, |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM43362 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |eth_none=true |flags= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |oui=0C:2A:69 }}
*[https://www.electricimp.com/platform/devices/ Devices] {{•}} [https://developer.electricimp.com/sites/default/files/attachments/hardware/datasheets/imp001_specification.pdf Datasheet] *[https://developer.electricimp.com/hardware/imp/modules ''Current imp Hardware Options'']
"Shadow-Chase V01" and "323C163371MD" is :silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. *Dimension: 31.0 x 25.0 mm (board)
This device is using a ''[[STMicroelectronics]]'' MCU :("F205RG6, BNML7VG, SGR207Y" marked)
*MCU: [[STMicroelectronics]] [https://www.st.com/en/microcontrollers-microprocessors/stm32f2x5.html STM32F205RG] :SoC: ARM Cortex-M3 MCU (120MHz max, 32-bit Core) :with Adaptive real-time accelerator (ART. Accelerator) :1MB Flash memory, MPU, UART, I²C, CAN, SDIO, USB OTG
===See also=== *[[List of Wi-Fi Flash SD Cards]] *[[Electric imp IMP001]] *[[Electric imp IMP002]] *[[Electric Imp imp004m]]
